name: Library Ninja
description:
This is my submission for the 48hr long Sacramento Developer Collective May Day Jam. I spent the first 24 hours working on just the AI and then I moved on to making all the assets. I made all the books and shelves. 

-Controls-

WASD for movement. 

Spacebar for throwing a pingpong ball to distract the librarians.

-GOAL-

Get the big book on the table and go back to the entrance to complete the level.
